author: Thorin Klosowski
title: The Bikepacking Camera Bag
text:
Ever wonder what photography gear someone on a bike tour through South America might need? Over at The Radavist, photographer Ryan Wilson shows off the gear he’s had with him for the last few months. Advertisement 
Wilson’s been bikepacking through South America, including large portions of the Andes. Wilson has plenty of gear with him, but his camera equipment is the highlight here. You can check out his amazing photos from the journey over on his Instagram and get more info about every item over at The Radavist . 
The bag is an F-Stop Kenti Backpack . Here’s what’s inside: Advertisement Sony A7Rii full frame mirrorless camera Sony 24-70 f/2.8 G-Master lens (primary)
